English.Text: They accept your offer, "she stay with familyâ€” at ze castle!" You are astonished to learn that the Queen dragged her skirts through the mud of the orchard, insisting that all her finely-dressed footmen should be fed and watered, and that no-one should know she or her retinue were there. One of the pickers you bribed laughs, emulating her speech, "I hope you don't zink me too bohemian a Monarch." His friend reminds him with a sharp nudge that mocking the Queen might not be the best idea. It is now just a question of exactly which of her landed relatives she came here to visit...
